overview: A short film by Joe Swanberg included on the DVD of Silver Bullets.  "footage from the first month of shooting a film that became Silver Bullets  "several of the actors from Silver Bullets are playing different characters here  "i hope this provides a window into my improvisatory process  "this footage is not sound mixed or color corrected the dialogue is difficult to hear at times"  â€” Joe Swanberg
title: Stray Bullets
